Title: Breakfast at Maison Dandoy
Details: Start your day with traditional Belgian waffles at Maison Dandoy.

Title: Grand Place
Details: Explore the Grand Place Brussels' central square known for its opulent guildhalls and the Town Hall.

Title: Manneken Pis
Details: Visit the famous Manneken Pis statue a short walk from the Grand Place.

Title: Atomium
Details: Take a short metro ride to the Atomium a unique building and museum that offers panoramic views of the city.

Title: Lunch at Le Pain Quotidien
Details: Enjoy a casual lunch at Le Pain Quotidien offering organic and wholesome dishes.

Title: Royal Palace of Brussels
Details: Visit the official palace of the Belgian King open to the public during the summer.

Title: Magritte Museum
Details: Explore the works of surrealist artist René Magritte at this dedicated museum.

Title: Parc du Cinquantenaire
Details: Relax and stroll around this large public park featuring impressive arches and museums.

Title: Sablon Neighborhood
Details: Discover the antique shops chocolatiers and the beautiful Church of Our Blessed Lady of the Sablon.

Title: Dinner at Chez Léon
Details: Enjoy a traditional Belgian dinner at Chez Léon famous for its mussels and seafood.

Title: Delirium Café
Details: End your day with a visit to Delirium Café known for its extensive beer menu featuring over 2000 different kinds of beer.

Title: Return to Hotel
Details: Head back to your hotel to rest after a full day of exploring.

Title: Travel to Bruges
Details: Catch a train from Brussels to Bruges. The journey takes about an hour.

Title: Breakfast at Patisserie Academie
Details: Start your day with delicious pastries and coffee at this charming patisserie.

Title: Market Square (Markt)
Details: Explore the Market Square the heart of Bruges surrounded by historic buildings and the Belfry of Bruges.

Title: Belfry of Bruges
Details: Climb the Belfry of Bruges for a stunning view of the city. The 366 steps are worth the effort for the panoramic view.

Title: Canal Tour
Details: Take a scenic boat tour through the canals of Bruges often referred to as the "Venice of the North."

Title: Lunch at a local restaurant in Bruges
Details: Enjoy a leisurely lunch at one of the local eateries in Bruges. Try some Flemish specialties like moules-frites (mussels and fries).

Title: Basilica of the Holy Blood
Details: Visit the Basilica of the Holy Blood known for its relic of the Holy Blood of Jesus Christ.

Title: Groeningemuseum
Details: Explore this museum showcasing Flemish and Belgian paintings from the 14th to the 20th century.

Title: Beguinage
Details: Stroll through this serene and historical area once home to a community of lay religious women.

Title: Minnewater Park
Details: Enjoy a relaxing walk in this picturesque park also known as the Lake of Love.

Title: Dinner at De Halve Maan Brewery
Details: Have dinner and try some local brews at this family-run brewery with a history dating back to 1856.

Title: Evening Walk
Details: Take a peaceful evening walk through the illuminated streets of Bruges.

Title: Travel back to Brussels
Details: Take the train back to Brussels.

Title: Return to Hotel
Details: Head back to your hotel to rest after a full day of exploring.
